Title: Ludo
Writer: Anurag Basu (story and screenplay), Samrat Chakraborty (dialogue), Sayef Turan
Actors: Pankaj Tripathi, Abhishek Bachchan, Rajkummar Rao, Fatima Sana Shaikh
Plot: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.
